abstract.t: This document specifies a new attribute for supporting prefixauthorization. Using RADIUS protocol, a client requests prefixesfrom a server; the client gives back the prefixes to the server; theclient is responsible for renewing the prefixes when the lifetimeexpires. The RADIUS server can also renumber prefixes. RADIUSclients can be home agents in MIPv6 and NEMO scenario, local mobileanchors in Proxy MIPv6 scenario, or common access routers.
